cause.description:
Support Lebanon is an cause that is part of the group "Free of Sectarianism: Together for Lebanon." We are asking for donations which will go to the families of those soldiers who died in the Nahr el-Bared fighting as well as other Lebanese who are in dire need.
About "Free of Sectarianism: Together for Lebanon"
Regardless of religion and political views, this group is for Lebanese, by Lebanese. We ask one question, ARE YOU FOR LEBANON? If you are dedicated towards working for a unified Lebanon, free of the viruses which plague it, then this group is for you.
1. Position #1
cause.mission: To help the families of those soldiers who died in the Nahr el-Bared fighting as well as other Lebanese people in Lebanon who are in need.
cause.name: Support Lebanon
